title.narrative: Climate Change Network - DFID Research Contribution

description.narrative: This activity (Climate Change Network - DFID Research Contribution) is a component of CDKN - Climate and Development Knowledge Network reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £39,392,582. This component benefits Developing countries, unspecified, and works in the following sector(s): Environmental research, Research/scientific institutions. , with the following implementing partners: PwC. The start date is 29-06-2009 and the end date is 31-12-2015.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

description.narrative: Environment - Water, Natural Resource Management and Environment - Environment - research/ education and training
Aggregated spend of less than £500 - Financial Year 2011 Quarter 4

provider-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)
